headline: EPAM Q4 Earnings Beat Estimates: What's in Store for the Stock?
summary: EPAM's Q4 results reflect strength in the Financial Services, Software & Hi-Tech, Life Sciences and Emerging verticals, offset by Business Info and Travel & Consumer.

headline: EPAM Systems Inc (EPAM) Q4 2024 Earnings Call Highlights: Strong Revenue Growth Amid Pricing ...
